By registering for or using the Service, you agree to these Terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. The specific features available to you depend on your chosen plan (Free, Pro, or Enterprise) and any add-on modules. We reserve the right to modify, expand, or discontinue features with reasonable notice. Service availability is targeted at 99.5% uptime, excluding scheduled maintenance.

All prices are in EUR and exclude applicable VAT. Payment is processed via Stripe. By subscribing to a paid plan, you authorize recurring charges. terms.dataProtection.text: We process personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws, including the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). By using the Service, you acknowledge that you have read and understood our Privacy Policy. For AI-powered compliance analysis, product data (not personal data) is transmitted to third-party AI providers. Data is stored on EU servers with row-level security for tenant isolation.

privacy.7.intro: As part of using Trackbliss, we process the following business data of our customers:

privacy.7.note: This data is processed exclusively for the provision of our contractual services (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR) and stored with tenant isolation (multi-tenant), so that only the respective tenant has access to their data.

privacy.8.text: Trackbliss offers AI-powered compliance analysis. Product data is transmitted to the AI model Claude (Anthropic) via the OpenRouter API. The transmission is encrypted. Only business data (product information, materials, certifications) is transmitted â€” no personal data of end customers. The legal basis is Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (contract performance) or Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent), as the analysis is actively initiated by the user.

privacy.9.text: For sending transactional emails (return confirmations, ticket notifications, invitations), we use the service Resend (Resend Inc., USA).
